channel.title: I need a good anti laag! Any suggestions?
channel.description:
Can any1 suggest a good one?..
Maybe give me the url to download it or maybe check it out?.. Thnx much![br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 08:36:43 PM[/size][hr]Any1 help me?..

item.title: I need a good anti laag! Any suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

[quote=“apollo921, post:5, topic:67361”]heres one i found in darkness-scape

[code]import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 99999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code][/quote]

this resets the server like every 3 weeks dude change the if(ResetTimer >= 999999) to if(ResetTimer >=1800) for every 30mins

Read full topic

item.title: I need a good anti laag! Any suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @heavinlyevil heavinlyevil
item.description:
@heavinlyevil wrote:

a good anti lagg ehh here is a copy of the one from pimpscape i find it good

[code]// This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code]

just replace ur anti lagg with that
